title: Reconstruire le travail d’une vie (Rebuilding a Life’s Work)
itunes:title: Reconstruire le travail d’une vie (Rebuilding a Life’s Work)
description:
Maya Husseini is a stained-glass artist who spent her career rebuilding churches in her hometown of Beirut. But after a warehouse explosion in August 2020, she’s forced to ask herself: Can she help rebuild Beirut again?

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/33UDa7R.
